column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Went here Monday for a late lunch with 2 girlfriends and was absolutely blown away by how amazing everything was for such a great price. One of the girls I was with had never experienced Ramen in a restaurant before and our server
column3: did a fine job of helping her pick out a dish
column4: was very knowledgeable of the menu
column5: and was on top of everything during our stay. Will most definitely be back time
